text: Charles L. Evans (born January 15, 1958) is an American economist and banker. He is the ninth president and chief executive officer of the Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago. He is on the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC), the Federal Reserve System's monetary policy-making body. ==References== ==Other websites== * Charles Evans' Biography Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American economists Category:Businesspeople from Chicago
title: Charles L. Evans
